Installation of FireMon APIÂ¶

Install firemon-api into a Python venv.

~$ python3 -m venv ~/virtualenvs/fmapi
~$ source ~/virtualenvs/fmapi/bin/activate
(fmapi) ~$ pip install firemon-api
Collecting firemon-api

FireMon-API is a Python web wrapper for the FireMon SIP (Security Mangager, etc...) APIs. The intent is make something that is useful for quick and easy development against FireMon products.
